meanings.definition: To select from a number of possibilities
meanings.sent1: She was choosing between two dresses for the party.
meanings.sent2: I am choosing what to have for dinner tonight.
meanings.sent3: The cat was choosing which toy to play with, taking its time.
meanings.sent4: The artist was choosing colors as if painting a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: Choosing the right path can lead to success.

meanings.definition: The act of making a choice
meanings.sent1: Her choosing surprised everyone at the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The choosing of the winner will be announced tomorrow.
meanings.sent3: The dog's choosing of treats was always entertaining to watch.
meanings.sent4: In life, our choosing shapes our future.
meanings.sent5: The importance of choosing wisely cannot be overstated.
